phyrus-modules.phyrus/apidoc: Generate a documentation for your API really fast and simple.
phyrus-modules.phyrus/auth: Easy signup-signin and User management system.
phyrus-modules.phyrus/maps: Display maps using Google Maps API.
phyrus-modules.phyrus/pdf: Generate, display and download pdf documents using HTML.
phyrus-modules.phyrus/ui: UI components, assets and helpers for Vue and Front-End.
